races.title: 5K Personal Best
races.description: Set a new personal record in the 5K during the 2024 Niagara Road Series, improving pace and race consistency through structured interval and tempo training.

races.title: Niagara Falls Half Marathon
races.description: Completed the Niagara Falls Half Marathon with strong negative splits and improved endurance strategy while managing elevation and pacing challenges.

races.description: Achieved a season-best time in the 400m, refining acceleration, stride mechanics, and late-race speed endurance through disciplined track sessions.
